name: backend
description: Telegram bot with AI and PostgreSQL integration

scripts.migrate: for file in migrations/*.sql; do [ -f "$file" ] && docker exec -i tracker_postgres psql -U postgres -d tracker_v2 < "$file" && echo "Applied: $file"; done
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d && sleep 5 && npm run migrate:all
scripts.db:wait: until docker exec tracker_postgres pg_isready -U postgres -d tracker_v2 > /dev/null 2>&1; do echo 'Waiting for database...'; sleep 2; done; echo 'Database is ready!'
scripts.env:setup: [ ! -f .env ] && cp .env.example .env && echo '.env file created! Please edit it with your credentials.' || echo '.env already exists'
scripts.docker:check: docker info > /dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'Docker is not running. Please start OrbStack/Docker Desktop.' && exit 1)
scripts.bootstrap:
npm run docker:check && npm run env:setup && npm install && npm run db:up && npm run db:wait && npm run migrate:all && echo '
âœ“ Bootstrap complete! Run: npm run dev'
